name: Loria
description: Loria is a homage to classics from golden era of strategy games, with modern spin on controls and user experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10 Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. Storage: 1250 MB available space
